titleStmt.title: Wittes pilgrimage, (by poeticall essaies) through a vvorld of amorous sonnets, soule-passions, and other passages, diuine, philosophicall, morall, poeticall, and politicall. By Iohn Dauies
titleStmt.author: Davies, John, 1565?-1618.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by R. Bradock] for Iohn Browne, and are to be sold at his shop in Saint Dunstones Churchyard in Fleetstreete,

notesStmt.note: Dedication signed: Iohn Davies of Hereford.
Printer's name supplied and publication date conjectured by STC.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his shop in Saint Dunstones Churchyard in Fleetstreete
